description: This file defines an interface `IController` within the `WPEFramework::PluginHost` namespace. The interface declares several pure virtual methods related to system control operations such as persist, delete, reboot, environment retrieval, configuration management, and cloning. It also includes licensing information and dependencies on 'Module.h'.

classes.name: IController
classes.description: An interface for controlling system or plugin-related operations, with methods for persistence, deletion, reboot, environment, configuration, and cloning.

methods.name: Persist
methods.description: Persists the current state or configuration.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a resource identified by the provided path.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieves the environment information for the specified index.

methods.name: Configuration (getter)
methods.description: Retrieves the configuration for the given callsign.

methods.name: Configuration (setter)
methods.description: Sets the configuration for the given callsign.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a clone of a resource based on a base callsign and assigns a new callsign.

ctags.name: IController
ctags.pattern: /^struct DEPRECATED EXTERNAL IController : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
